lead_paragraph: Lazard's Australian private equity arm will probably sell two more of its businesses in coming months and will introduce a new fund to take advantage of acquisition opportunities in the services sector, its chief told Reuters.
snippet: Lazard's Australian private equity arm is likely to sell two more of its businesses in coming months and will launch a new fund to take advantage of acquisition opportunities in the services sector, its chief said.

headline.main: Lazard's Australian Buyout Arm to Sell More Businesses

abstract: Lazard's Australian private equity arm is likely to sell two more of its businesses in coming months and will launch a new fund to take advantage of acquisition opportunities in the services sector, its chief said.
